de.a46.memory.gui
Interface UserActionListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
Starter
public interface UserActionListener

Interface UserActionListener bundels all methods, that can be called by the gui layer, when an event occured. In the memory this is done by class MainPanel, while the interface is implemented by class Starter.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Till Zoppke

Method Summary
 void bigImageClicked()
          This is called when the user clicks a big image to the left.

          This is called when the user clicks a card in the field.
 void exitAction()
          This is called when the user wants to quit the game.
 void newgameAction()
          This is called when the user wants to restart the game.
